#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LEN 4000006
char s[LEN];
void Compute_Failure_Function_And_Print(int length,vector<int> v) {
	int len=0;
	v[0]=0;
	int i=1;
	while(i<length) {
		if(s[i]==s[len]) {
			len++;
			v[i]=len;
			i++;
		}
		else {
			if(len!=0) {
				len=v[len-1];
			} else {
				v[i]=0;
				i++;
			}
		}
	}
	for(int i=0;i<length;i++) {
		printf("%d ",v[i]);
	}
	printf("\n");
}
int main() {
	scanf("%s",s);
	while(strcmp(s,"End")) {
		int len=strlen(s);
		vector<int> ar(len+1);
		Compute_Failure_Function_And_Print(len,ar);
		scanf("%s",s);
	}
	return 0;
}
